Richard SCAMPONE, as Executor of the Estate of Madeline Scampone, Respondent
v.
GRANE HEALTHCARE COMPANY, Grane Associates, L.P., Highland Park Care Center, LLC. d/b/a Highland Park Care Center, Trebro, Inc., Petitioners Richard Scampone, as Executor of the Estate of Madeline Scampone, Respondent
v.
Grane Healthcare Company, Grane Associates, L.P., Highland Park Care Center, LLC, d/b/a Highland Park Care Center, Trebro, Inc., Petitioners Richard Scampone, as Executor of the Estate of Madeline Scampone, Respondent
v.
Grane Healthcare Company, Grane Associates, L.P., Highland Park Care Center, LLC d/b/a Highland Park Care Center , Trebro, Inc., Petitioners No. 438 WAL 2017
No. 439 WAL 2017
No. 440 WAL 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. June 26, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 26th day of June, 2018, the Cross Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
